name: Chandan Sahoo
tagline: DevOps & AI Engineer | AWS | GenAI | LLMs

projects.title: AI-Powered Log Analyzer
projects.summary: Built a GenAI system using LangChain and LlamaIndex to analyze application logs and suggest fixes. Deployed on AWS EKS with Terraform.

projects.title: Infrastructure Chatbot
projects.summary: Created a chatbot using LangChain that answers DevOps questions by querying AWS CLI docs and internal runbooks. Hosted on EC2.

projects.title: Automated Resume-to-Portfolio Generator
projects.summary: Python tool that converts resume into a static portfolio website using Jinja2 and enhances summaries with LLM.
